mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
